message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a chance to own this unique product.  I value it highly, but I believe its true worth will be realized in your hands. To start the negotiation, I propose a price of $1,500,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value you place on the product, but given my current financial situation, I can only offer $1,200,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it falls short of what I believe the product is truly worth. Let's find a middle ground. How about $1,350,000?
I've considered your latest offer, Alice. While I respect your valuation of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1,300,000. This is my best offer within my budget.
